[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@multiversx/sdk-core](./sdk-core.md) &gt; [Type](./sdk-core.type.md)

## Type class

An abstraction that represents a Type. Handles both generic and non-generic types. Once instantiated as a Type, a generic type is "closed" (as opposed to "open").

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Type 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |

For example, Option<u32> is assignable from Option<!-- -->&lt;<!-- -->?<!-- -->&gt;<!-- -->. For more details, see the implementation of [OptionType](./sdk-core.optiontype.md) and @[OptionalType](./sdk-core.optionaltype.md)<!-- -->.</p><p>Also see: - https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Covariance\_and\_contravariance\_(computer\_science) - https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/standard/generics/covariance-and-contravariance</p> |
